title: Fail riot fail
body: Sooooo. If someone gets my account password they can easily just click on change email address in my account and submit the account passsword (LoL) and have complete control over my account. What the fak riot? If they have access to the LoL account why on earth would you allow them to change the email address? Make sure if they want to change the email adresss they better send a email confirming that someone is wanting to change the email address on the LoL account.

replies.body: I believe it's necessary to also have access to the current email address to in order to verify an email change, so that confirmation requirement does exist.  It sucks that's happening to you, and we'd like to help.  Reach out to our account recovery team through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and we'll dig into this.  We'll reply back as soon as we can.
